attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app took 1 whole hour to download and when I tried to use another app while I was waiting it completely restarted again!!

attributes.title: This is a bad app.
attributes.review: I downloaded it and the app is unorganized. I can’t figure out how to work it. It either needs many fixes or it should be deleted all together.

attributes.title: I would like to speak to the manager
attributes.review:
Downloaded in hopes of a REAL education about our president. Didn’t get it sadly. Took 8 DAYS to download, which is UNACCEPTABLE!! OUR president, his royal orange-ness, would NOT stand for this! 
As a proud American, I would like to announce that THIS is not it sis.

attributes.title: Terrible app✨🧚
attributes.review: I just got my phone fixed because after I downloaded the app it completely shut down my phone and broke it 😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took an hour to download. I am so angry. 😡😡. Whoever is thinking about downloading this app don’t do it. It took all my precious time and isn’t worth it. So if you value your loife, don’t download this app man . It’ll haunt u!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app took almost 2 year to download and while it was downloading, I glitches my phone so I couldn’t use any other app! Definitely do not recommend, 1 Star, do not download!

This app is TERRIBLE. It’s not helpful, it’s a wasted of space. I REFUSE to vote for a orange looking roach 😔.
He’s a terrible man, He watch these folks get hurt, put people In cages, and so much more.
He’s shaped like the letter “P”.😔
He looks like he smells like hotdog water and old pee.😔 ion know what else to say.😔

attributes.title: made me vomit
attributes.review: I opened the app, saw our Cheeto of a president face, and threw up my Chick Fil A. How can you improve this app you may ask? Change it to only pictures and facts about Barron. That will get the reviews up.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: It took 10 minutes to download And I have great internet. It had lots of adds and it takes forever to see the news😡! Do t download this u will regret it!😡

attributes.title: Almost hitler
attributes.review: This man has barely done anything good in his life. He's a rapist, narcissist, hypocrite, homophobic, racist man, a criminal. Its a shame that any women votes for him. He's even trying to take away our basic rights and trying to control our free speech.
